p: Curcuma longa L. leaf essential oil was also tested on adult S. oryzae for contact and fumigation toxicity and for its effect on offspring production. S. oryzae adults were very susceptible to fumigation activity, which amounted to LC50 11.36 mg/litre air. At a concentration of 40.5 mg/g food, the production of S. oryzaeâ€™s offspring was completely inhibited [ 50].
